data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in Oita.
In the minute 3, Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Shonan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Oita's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Oita.
In the minute 5, Hiroki Kasahara awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Oita.
Daiki Kaneko for Shonan has been booked by Hiroki Kasahara and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 8, Naoki Ishihara is on target to give Shonan a 0-1 advantage.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Hiroki Kasahara.
Goal! Kazuki Oiwa extends Shonan lead to 0-2 with a header.
In the minute 11, Temma Matsuda with an assist there.
Corner awarded to Oita.
Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 15, Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
Hiroki Kasahara signals a throw-in for Oita, close to Shonan's area.
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 18, At Showa Denko Dome Oita, Kazushi Mitsuhira has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Oita at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
In the minute 21, Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Shonan.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
In Oita a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Oita.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hiroki Kasahara awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 30, Oita have been awarded a corner by Hiroki Kasahara.
Oita push upfield but Hiroki Kasahara quickly pulls them for offside.
Shonan needs to be cautious. Oita have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 32, Oita have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Oita.
Hiroki Kasahara awards Oita a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Oita are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Shonan in the half of Oita.
In the minute 39, Goal kick for Shonan at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Shonan drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Corner awarded to Oita.
In the minute 42, Kazushi Mitsuhira of Oita gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a Oita throw-in in Shonan's half.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Oita.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Shonan.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Oita drives forward and Kazushi Mitsuhira gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Shonan to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 48, Hiroki Kasahara awards Oita a goal kick.
Throw-in for Oita in their own half.
Oita's Tatsuya Tanaka misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 49, Shonan have a goal kick.
Oita awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
In the minute 52, Oita have been awarded a corner by Hiroki Kasahara.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a Oita throw-in in Shonan's half.
Throw-in for Oita in the half of Shonan.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Shonan at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Oita are coming forward and Kazushi Mitsuhira gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Shonan at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
In the minute 55, Shonan have a dangerous throw-in.
Shonan drive upfield and Temma Matsuda gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Oita defender.
Ball safe as Oita is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Oita at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Oita to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
Throw-in for Oita close to the penalty box.
In the minute 60, Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
Oita to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
Hiroki Kasahara awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 62, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
Mitsuki Saito is on a sub for Akimi Barada for Shonan.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Shonan are pushing forward but Mitsuki Saito's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Oita.
In the minute 65, Daiki Watari is replacing Kazushi Mitsuhira for the home team.
Throw-in for Oita in the half of Shonan.
Hiroki Kasahara awards Shonan a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
In Oita a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 72, Shonan make their second substitution with Ryo Nemoto replacing Naoki Ishihara.
The away team replace Takuya Okamoto with Shota Kobayashi.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a Oita throw-in in Shonan's half.
The home team have replaced Kento Haneda with Ryosuke Maeda. This is the second substitution made today by Tomohiro Katanosaka.
In the minute 73, Kohei Isa is replacing Kei Chinen for Oita at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Shonan have a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Tomoki Iwata of Oita smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Oita.
Free kick Oita.
In the minute 77, Important block from the Shonan defence as Kohei Isa fires in a strike for Oita.
So close for Oita as Tomoki Iwata's shot comes back off the post.
In Oita, Ryosuke Maeda of Oita is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 78, Toshio Shimakawa (Oita) heads in to reduce the deficit. The score is now 1-2.
That's a fine assist from Yuto Misao.
Shonan pushes forward through Yuto Iwasaki, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 79, Oita's Daiki Watari attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
Throw-in for Oita in their own half.
In the minute 80, Throw-in high up the field for Oita in Oita.
Can Oita capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shonan's half?
Goal kick for Shonan at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
In the minute 81, Tomohiro Katanosaka (Oita) is making a fourth substitution, with Yuki Kagawa replacing Yuto Misao.
Tomohiro Katanosaka is making the team's fifth substitution at Showa Denko Dome Oita with Kazuhiro Sato replacing Yamato Machida.
Throw-in Oita.
In the minute 82, Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Hiroki Kasahara.
Oita attack but Kohei Isa's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 84, Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
Satoshi Tanaka is replacing Temma Matsuda for the away team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 87, Throw-in high up the field for Shonan in Oita.
Ball safe as Oita is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kohei Isa gets an equalizer for Oita. The score is now 2-2.
In the minute 89, In Oita Oita drive forward through Daiki Watari. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Hiroki Kasahara awards Shonan a goal kick.
Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
Throw-in Shonan.
Oita to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
In Oita Oita attack through Tatsuya Tanaka. The finish is off target, however.
Shonan have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Oita.
Oita's Tatsuya Tanaka fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
Hiroki Kasahara blows to end the match. The final score is 2-2.
